knimeNode.name: Collect Slices
knimeNode.shortDescription: Collects slices of a slice iterator

fullDescription.intro: Node at the end of a slice loop. It is used to mark the end of a slice loop and collects the intermediate results by row-wise collecting and merging of the incoming image slices. Only ImgPlus and Labelings are used. The start of the loop is defined by the slice loop start node, in which you can define the number of slices you want to process at once.
